channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 乌克兰军力不足，新任总司令精于算计、作风强硬，领导着乌克兰的地面部队
item.description: Ukraine’s outgunned military has a calculating, hard-charging new chief leading its ground forces on.wsj.com/3SzixU7 on.wsj.com/3SzixU7

item.title: 哈里王子就针对英国小报《每日镜报》的法律索赔达成和解，哈里王子指控该报多次入侵他的手机，以了解他的私生活。
item.description: Prince Harry settled a legal claim against the British tabloid the Daily Mirror, which he alleged repeatedly hacked his cellphone to find out information about his private life on.wsj.com/3STrWHG on.wsj.com/3STrWHG

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：@KimStrassel写道：特朗普将实现共和党核心承诺--边境安全--的最佳机会拱手相让，这对他自己和他的政党都没有好处。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Trump is doing neither himself nor his party any favors in deep-sixing his best shot at fulfilling the core GOP promise of border security, writes @KimStrassel on.wsj.com/3OFrKZX

item.title: 街谈巷议：设计师时装品牌的销售增长正变得越来越两极分化。咄咄逼人的价格走势有助于解释原因。
item.description: Heard on the Street: Sales growth at designer fashion labels is becoming more polarized. Aggressive price moves help explain why. on.wsj.com/3SxOIDw on.wsj.com/3SxOIDw

item.title: 自大流行病肆虐以来，犯罪浪潮席卷了加利福尼亚州奥克兰市，导致企业停业，居民面临重重挑战
item.description: A crime wave that has gripped Oakland, Calif., since the pandemic has prompted business shutdowns and challenges for residents on.wsj.com/3ST6vq0 on.wsj.com/3ST6vq0

item.title: 对资产管理公司来说，向 ETF 的迁移是一场噩梦，因此他们正在想办法吸引投资者留下来。这将使好的基金变得更好，但对于坏的基金来说，这不是救命稻草。
item.description: The migration to ETFs has been a nightmare for asset managers, so they’re working on a way to entice investors to stick around. It would make good funds better, but it’s no salvation for bad ones. on.wsj.com/3HQ6gWB on.wsj.com/3HQ6gWB

item.title: 塔玛尔-梅茨格（Tamar Metzger）和其他哈马斯俘虏相互依靠，分享故事、食物和药物，度过了在加沙地下的数周时间。
item.description: Sharing stories, food and medication, Tamar Metzger and other Hamas captives leaned on one another to make it through weeks underground in Gaza on.wsj.com/3SGRV3Q on.wsj.com/3SGRV3Q

item.title: Brad Wilcox 写道：这个情人节，不要相信灵魂伴侣的神话：好的婚姻需要的不仅仅是浪漫的感情
item.description: This Valentine’s Day, don’t buy the soulmate myth: a good marriage requires more than romantic feelings, writes Brad Wilcox on.wsj.com/3OE9ccJ on.wsj.com/3OE9ccJ

item.title: R to @WSJ：女性占美国劳动力的 46.9%，男性占 53.1%。以下是按性别分列的热门工作。
item.description: Women make up 46.9% of the American workforce, while men make up 53.1%. Here’ a breakdown of the top jobs by gender. on.wsj.com/49MTyUz

item.title: 美国数以百计的工作岗位是根据性别和种族划分的？新数据提供了美国许多最重要职业的工人分类简况
item.description: Who fills hundreds of U.S. jobs according to their gender and race? New data offers a snapshot of how workers sort themselves into many of the most important professions in the country on.wsj.com/42xsm9A on.wsj.com/42xsm9A

item.title: 支持巴勒斯坦的抗议者在布朗大学加紧活动，该校董事会正与上周开始绝食的 18 名学生僵持不下。
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protesters have ratcheted up their activism at Brown University, where the school’s board is in a standoff with 18 students who began a hunger strike last week on.wsj.com/49vqm40 on.wsj.com/49vqm40

item.title: 委内瑞拉将轻型坦克、配备导弹的巡逻艇和装甲运兵车开到两国边境，以支持其吞并圭亚那石油资源丰富地区的威胁。
item.description: Venezuela is backing up its threats to annex an oil-rich part of Guyana by moving light tanks, missile-equipped patrol boats and armored carriers to the two countries’ border on.wsj.com/4bvPNEw on.wsj.com/4bvPNEw

item.title: 一个穿着 "你让我兴奋 "衬衫的毛绒动物。休-海夫纳式的长袍。Build-A-Bear（建熊）向着色情熊的方向发展，引发了笑声和咆哮声；"Build-A-Bear，你发情了吗？
item.description: A stuffed animal wearing a “You Turn Me On” shirt. Hugh Hefner-esque robes. Build-A-Bear pivots toward risqué bears, prompting grins and growls; "Build-A-Bear, are you in heat?" on.wsj.com/3w4kaS8 on.wsj.com/3w4kaS8

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：关于拜登总统滥用机密文件的问题，现在要求国家相信这位健忘老人的辩护词
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Regarding President Biden’s misuse of classified documents, the country is now asked to believe the forgetful elderly man defense on.wsj.com/3SPUkKG

item.title: 多年来，科技行业在很大程度上远离旧金山的政治。现在不会了"够了够了，我们要卷入泥潭"
item.description: For years, the tech industry largely stayed away from San Francisco politics. Not anymore. “Enough is enough, we’re getting involved in the muck.” on.wsj.com/485HxYY on.wsj.com/485HxYY

item.title: 近年来，小型航空公司如雨后春笋般涌现，它们为特定的旅行提供服务，并承诺以更低的票价提供更好的服务。以下是四家崭露头角的航空公司。
item.description: In recent years, small airlines have popped up catering to very specific trips and promising a better ride for lower fares. Here are four upstarts taking to the skies. on.wsj.com/495n0Fl on.wsj.com/495n0Fl

item.title: 我们采访了近十位与拜登总统同一天出生的美国人，并向他们提问：拜登再次参选是否太老了？他们是这样回答的。
item.description:
We interviewed nearly a dozen Americans born the same day as President Biden and asked them: Is Biden too old to run again? Here’s what they said. on.wsj.com/3Uv0YqY

on.wsj.com/3Uv0YqY

item.title: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）希望重塑全球半导体产业--他可能需要高达 7 万亿美元的资金来实现这一目标
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman wants to reshape the global semiconductor industry—and he could need as much as $7 trillion to do it on.wsj.com/4bqRIKF on.wsj.com/4bqRIKF

item.title: 镶板木质天花板赋予房间个性和温暖，一位设计师将其比喻为一个拥抱。我们与专家探讨了其中的奥妙。
item.description: A paneled wood ceiling gives a room character and warmth that one designer likens to a hug. We discussed the ins and outs with the experts. on.wsj.com/3OAEHEi on.wsj.com/3OAEHEi

item.title: 安德烈-阿加西曾经是世界上最伟大的网球运动员，现在他有了一项新的最爱球拍类运动。在这里，他谈到了皮球运动、他珍爱的项链和他的每周例行活动。
item.description: Once the world’s greatest tennis player, Andre Agassi has a new favorite racquet sport. Here, he talks about playing pickleball, the necklace he treasures and his weekly routines. on.wsj.com/3HIU0qz on.wsj.com/3HIU0qz

item.title: 童子军受害者要求最高法院在普渡制药公司的类似破产计划做出裁决之前停止支付和解金
item.description: Boy Scouts victims are asking the Supreme Court to halt settlement payments until Purdue Pharma’s similar bankruptcy plan is decided on.wsj.com/49kYJec on.wsj.com/49kYJec

item.title: 由于早期迹象表明，被监禁的前总理伊姆兰-汗的政党出人意料地表现强劲，选举结果被推迟，手机服务仍然暂停，一场动荡的选举又被推上了风口浪尖。
item.description: A turbulent election was thrown into further question as results were delayed and cellphone service remained suspended amid early indications of a surprisingly strong showing by the party of jailed former Prime Minister Imran Khan on.wsj.com/3SRGtDu on.wsj.com/3SRGtDu

item.title: 如果一袋 Chex Mix 在新奥尔良机场的价格是 3.49 美元，那么在拉瓜迪亚机场怎么会是 9.99 美元？互联网对机场零食的高价进行了比较和质疑
item.description: If a bag of Chex Mix costs $3.49 at the airport in New Orleans, how is it $9.99 at LaGuardia? The internet has come together to compare—and question—the high price of snacks at airports on.wsj.com/3STLc7X on.wsj.com/3STLc7X

item.title: 当许多美国城市正在为大量新移民的到来而苦苦挣扎时，堪萨斯州托皮卡正在邀请所有获准在美国工作的人前来工作
item.description: While many American cities are struggling with large numbers of newly arrived migrants, Topeka, Kan. is inviting anyone and everyone with permission to work in the U.S. to come its way on.wsj.com/3whJCne on.wsj.com/3whJCne

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）表示，换俘可能会导致《华尔街日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）获释，但拒绝透露获释的时间框架
item.description: Vladimir Putin said a prisoner exchange would probably lead to the release of Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich but declined to give a time frame for the release on.wsj.com/3Uyk7YW on.wsj.com/3Uyk7YW

item.title: "有人会加奶油，但我觉得太重了。朱丽叶-比诺什（Juliette Binoche）对制作煎蛋卷有自己的看法，对其他大多数烹饪问题也是如此。一起来看看这位奥斯卡获奖女演员在巴黎设备齐全的厨房吧。
item.description: “Some people add cream, but I think it's too heavy.” Juliette Binoche has opinions on making omelets—and on most other matters culinary, too. Take a peek inside the Oscar-winning actress's well-equipped Paris kitchen. on.wsj.com/3SNtLWp on.wsj.com/3SNtLWp

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：没有人命令退休消防员在 9/11 事件发生的那一周前往零点报到。但鲍勃-贝克维斯出现了，就像自建国以来普通美国人在国家紧急时刻所做的那样，@KarlRove 写道。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: No one ordered retired firefighters to report to Ground Zero the week of 9/11. But Bob Beckwith showed up, just as ordinary Americans have done in urgent moments for our country since its founding, writes @KarlRove. on.wsj.com/4bwrPck

item.title: 他们的家拥有水景和沙滩，而且离大海很远
item.description: Their home has water views and a sandy beach—and it’s nowhere near the ocean on.wsj.com/498WMRY on.wsj.com/498WMRY

item.title: "私募股权》是一本关于在残酷、高风险的顶级对冲基金世界工作的新回忆录。点击此处阅读节选。
item.description: "Private Equity" is a new memoir about working in the cutthroat, high-risk world of top hedge funds. Read an excerpt here. on.wsj.com/42BJmLZ on.wsj.com/42BJmLZ
